data.text: @Zander_in_Au @nzherald Herald not covered itself in glory. Repeating lies for affect. slashed v let down. Acid v pepper spray. Facts important.  Media decline
@EerjkMcRaeOF @Zander_in_Au @nzherald As I was a bit naughty as a kid… It’s pretty easy: Chuck a couple of twigs in valves, lets down tyres pretty efficiently & quickly!
@Zander_in_Au @nzherald They also need to go to grammar school — it’s vs its 🤦🏻‍♀️ Journalism is dead

@Zander_in_Au @nzherald Copper chopper? What's that you're holding mate. Is that a tyre slasher Mr Dirty Tricks Kiwi Policeman. Andrew Coster's tactical jackboot thug branch out of control. #ArrestAndrewCoster #ArrestPotoWilliams #TyreSlasher #DirtyTricks https://t.co/4h556a3x2c
@comms24_c24 @i_lovecoffee @nzherald Looks friendly… maybe a boot lace hook 🤦🏻‍♂️

@Zander_in_Au @i_lovecoffee @nzherald Copper chopper? What's that you're holding mate. Is that a tyre slasher Mr Dirty Tricks Kiwi Policeman. Andrew Coster's tactical jackboot thugbranch out of control. New Zealand police. #ArrestAndrewCoster #ArrestPotoWilliams #TyreSlasher #DirtyTricks https://t.co/DNMXC2r8oT
@Zander_in_Au @nzherald Police made a statement that the air was let out. The media lied and stated they were slashed

@Zander_in_Au @nzherald @NZPoliceMedia press release states "protestors let down the tyres of four Police vehicles parked on Featherston Street". Why would police say "let down" rather than "slashed"? 🤔
